languages.text: "Конечно, куда же еще? Я знаю путь: их маленькая крепость снится мне ночами — сломленная и охваченная огнем. Все подходы, прилегающие высоты и укрытия выжжены в моем разуме — так часто я думаю об этом месте. Скоро мы с Пасынками окажемся там".

"Of course you do. Where else? I know the way. I dream of their little fortress at night, overwhelmed and aflame. The avenues of approach, the adjacent high grounds, the shelters — they are all burned into my mind because of how often I think about that place. The Stepchildren and I will arrive there very soon."
languages.original_text: "Конечно, куда же еще? Я знаю путь: их маленькая крепость снится мне ночами — сломленная и охваченная огнем. Все подходы, прилегающие высоты и укрытия выжжены в моем разуме — так часто я думаю об этом месте. Скоро мы с Пасынками окажемся там".

The avenues of approach, the adjacent high grounds, the shelters are all burned into my mind because of how often I think about that place. The Stepchildren and I will be there soon."

The Stepchildren and I will arrive there very soon."

The avenues of approach, the adjacent high grounds, the shelters — they are all burned into my mind because of how often I think about that place. The Stepchildren and I will arrive there very soon."

languages.text: «Claro que sí. ¿Adónde, si no? Conozco el camino. Sueño con su pequeña fortaleza todas las noches, asolada y en llamas. Las rutas de acceso, el terreno elevado cercano, los refugios... lo tengo todo grabado en la cabeza de lo mucho que pienso en ella. Los hijastros y yo llegaremos allí muy pronto».
languages.original_text: "Of course you do. Where else? I know the way. I dream of their little fortress at night, overwhelmed and aflame. The avenues of approach, the adjacent high grounds, the shelters — they are all burned into my mind because of how often I think about that place. The Stepchildren and I will arrive there very soon."

traits.locale_text: «Claro que sí. ¿Adónde, si no? Conozco el camino. Sueño con su pequeña fortaleza todas las noches, asolada y en llamas. Las rutas de acceso, el terreno elevado cercano, los refugios... lo tengo todo grabado en la cabeza de lo mucho que pienso en ella. Los hijastros y yo llegaremos allí muy pronto».

languages.text: “是啊，法务部的哨站，不然还能去哪里呢？我知道通往那里的路，我在夜里会梦到他们小小的堡垒，不堪一击，熊熊燃烧。通往那里的大道、附近的高地、避难所……这一切都烙在我的脑海里，因为我时常会想到那个地方。用不了多久，我和继子团的成员就会向那里进军。”
languages.original_text: "Of course you do. Where else? I know the way. I dream of their little fortress at night, overwhelmed and aflame. The avenues of approach, the adjacent high grounds, the shelters — they are all burned into my mind because of how often I think about that place. The Stepchildren and I will arrive there very soon."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，法务部的哨站，不然还能去哪里呢？我知道通往那里的路，我在夜里会梦到他们小小的堡垒，不堪一击，熊熊燃烧。通往那里的大道、附近的高地、避难所……这一切都烙在我的脑海里，因为我时常会想到那个地方。用不了多久，我和继子团的成员就会向那里进军。”

languages.text: 「もちろん、そこに向かうよ。他にどこへ行くっていうんだ？俺は道を知っている。夜には彼らの小さなフォートレスの夢を見る。圧倒され、燃え立っている姿を。接近経路、隣接する高地、シェルター―それらはすべて俺の心に焼き付いてる。その場所を考えることがあまりにも多いからだ。連れ子たちと俺は、すぐにそこに着くだろう」
languages.original_text: "Of course you do. Where else? I know the way. I dream of their little fortress at night, overwhelmed and aflame. The avenues of approach, the adjacent high grounds, the shelters — they are all burned into my mind because of how often I think about that place. The Stepchildren and I will arrive there very soon."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん、そこに向かうよ。他にどこへ行くっていうんだ？俺は道を知っている。夜には彼らの小さなフォートレスの夢を見る。圧倒され、燃え立っている姿を。接近経路、隣接する高地、シェルター―それらはすべて俺の心に焼き付いてる。その場所を考えることがあまりにも多いからだ。連れ子たちと俺は、すぐにそこに着くだろう」

languages.text: « Évidemment. Où d'autre pourriez-vous bien aller ? Je connais le chemin. La nuit, je rêve de leur petite forteresse, submergée et en proie aux flammes. Les voies d'accès, les positions surélevées à proximité, les abris éventuels... À force de retourner la question dans tous les sens, tout est gravé là, dans ma tête. Bientôt, très bientôt, mes frères et moi irons leur rendre une petite visite. »
languages.original_text: "Of course you do. Where else? I know the way. I dream of their little fortress at night, overwhelmed and aflame. The avenues of approach, the adjacent high grounds, the shelters — they are all burned into my mind because of how often I think about that place. The Stepchildren and I will arrive there very soon."

traits.locale_text: « Évidemment. Où d'autre pourriez-vous bien aller ? Je connais le chemin. La nuit, je rêve de leur petite forteresse, submergée et en proie aux flammes. Les voies d'accès, les positions surélevées à proximité, les abris éventuels... À force de retourner la question dans tous les sens, tout est gravé là, dans ma tête. Bientôt, très bientôt, mes frères et moi irons leur rendre une petite visite. »

languages.text: "Elbette. Başka gidecek yer mi var? Yolu biliyorum. Geceleri onların küçük kalesini rüyalarımda görüyorum... İstila edilmiş, alevler içinde hem de. Yaklaşma yolları, bitişikteki yüksek mevkiler, siperler... O yeri o kadar sık düşünüyorum ki hepsi zihnime kazılı. Üvey Evlatlar ile çok yakında orada olacağız."
languages.original_text: "Of course you do. Where else? I know the way. I dream of their little fortress at night, overwhelmed and aflame. The avenues of approach, the adjacent high grounds, the shelters — they are all burned into my mind because of how often I think about that place. The Stepchildren and I will arrive there very soon."

traits.locale_text: "Elbette. Başka gidecek yer mi var? Yolu biliyorum. Geceleri onların küçük kalesini rüyalarımda görüyorum... İstila edilmiş, alevler içinde hem de. Yaklaşma yolları, bitişikteki yüksek mevkiler, siperler... O yeri o kadar sık düşünüyorum ki hepsi zihnime kazılı. Üvey Evlatlar ile çok yakında orada olacağız."

languages.text: "Natürlich müsst Ihr das. Wohin auch sonst? Ich kenne den Weg. Ich träume nachts von ihrer kleinen Festung, überwältigt und in Flammen. Die Zugangsstraßen, die angrenzenden Anhöhen, die Bunker ... all das hat sich in meinen Verstand gebrannt, weil ich so oft an diesen Ort denke. Bald werden die Stiefkinder und ich dort eintreffen."
languages.original_text: "Of course you do. Where else? I know the way. I dream of their little fortress at night, overwhelmed and aflame. The avenues of approach, the adjacent high grounds, the shelters — they are all burned into my mind because of how often I think about that place. The Stepchildren and I will arrive there very soon."

Die Zugangsstraßen, die angrenzenden Anhöhen, die Bunker ... all das hat sich in meinen Verstand gebrannt, weil ich so oft an diesen Ort denke. Bald werden die Stiefkinder und ich dort eintreffen."
